meanings.definition: A group of synthetic chemicals used as insecticides.
meanings.sent1: Farmers use permethrins to protect their crops from harmful insects.
meanings.sent2: The permethrins were sprayed in the garden to keep pests away.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous ants threw a party, but the permethrins crashed it!
meanings.sent4: The permethrins acted like a shield, repelling bugs from the plants.
meanings.sent5: The permethrins worked like magic, making the garden bug-free.

meanings.definition: The plural form of permethrin, a type of insecticide.
meanings.sent1: She bought multiple bottles of permethrins for the upcoming camping trip.
meanings.sent2: The store had a sale on permethrins, so I stocked up on them.
meanings.sent3: The permethrins on the shelf whispered to each other, planning their bug-fighting strategy.
meanings.sent4: The permethrins stood together like an army, ready to battle the insect invaders.
meanings.sent5: The permethrins lined up on the counter, a colorful display of bug-fighting power.
